about.subTitle: I love making things simple, intuitive and expertly crafted!
about.mainTitle: Product is the vital essence of what i do, truly great product is born of meticulous planning and process. This is where i specialized!

aboutSection.subtitle: about me
aboutSection.paragraph: Hi! I’m Muhammad Mabrouk, and I’m a developer who has passion for building clean web applications with intuitive functionality. I enjoy the process of turning ideas into reality using creative solutions. I’m always curious about learning new skills, tools, and concepts. In addition to working on various solo full stack projects, I have worked with creative teams, which involves daily stand-ups and communications, source control, and project management.

skillsSection.subtitle: my skills
skillsSection.paragraph: I develop simple, intuitive and responsive user interface that helps users get things done with less effort and time with those technologies.

experienceSection.subtitle: experience
experienceSection.paragraph: I have been developing sites and apps for 12 years and i know for sure the main trends and directions of modern design, I have been a visionary and a reliable software engineering partner for world-class brands. You will get a decent result as you expect.

portfolioSection.subtitle: my works
portfolioSection.paragraph: We develop the best quality website that serves for the long-term. Well-documented, clean, easy and elegant interface helps any non-technical clients.

i1.quote: Nafie simply provides amazing web development service. Their team is extremely professional and the easiest to meet I have ever worked with. I would recommend Nafie to anyone.
i1.author: Terrell Grimes

i2.quote: Excellent Team to work with. Always positive to find the most appropriate solution. Nafie is one of the professional web development agency that provides awesome services.
i2.author: Lonny Corkery

i3.quote: Nafie team is very professional, always delivers high quality results, and is always there to help. Look forward to working with Nafie in other projects.
i3.author: Max Schmidt DDS

i4.quote: Nafie worked on a handful of projects for us and has always exceeded our expectations. Nafie team is dedicated, talented and a delight to work with.
i4.author: Amir Stoltenberg

i5.quote: I know I can count on your service if I need my project done fast and with the best possible result. I am a regular customer and hope to continue our work!
i5.author: Kenton Marquardt

contactSection.subtitle: contact
contactSection.paragraph: Get in touch and let me know how i can help. Fill out the form and i’ll be in touch as soon as possible.

portfolioPage.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting, remaining essentially unchanged. It was popularised in the 1960s with the release of Letraset sheets containing Lorem Ipsum passages, and more recently with desktop publishing software like Aldus PageMaker including versions of Lorem Ipsum.
